meta.name: DC Chinese Food Map
meta.description: This Json file is for good Chinese food in DC, updating is welcome. More info visit https://blog.jing.do/6436/

data.name: Hokkaido Seafood Buffet
data.description: 海鲜自助，有sushi、海鲜、中餐等，味道还不错，中午去的话价格非常便宜。

data.name: Hunan Gate
data.description: 很不错的东北菜，别问我为何叫hunan gate。
